meanings.sent1: The zebra has a stripey coat.
meanings.sent2: The shirt I bought is very stripey.
meanings.sent3: The stripey cat looked like it was wearing a fancy suit.
meanings.sent4: The stripey pattern on the wall made the room feel more cozy.
meanings.sent5: I always remember the stripey flag at the beach.

meanings.sent1: The rainbow looked so stripey in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The curtains had a stripey design that matched the sofa.
meanings.sent3: The stripey shadows on the ground made it look like a giant zebra was passing by.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was so stripey, it reminded me of a candy cane.
meanings.sent5: The road was covered in stripey lines, guiding us along the way.
